mapper.insert: insert into driver (driver_seq, m_id, driver_depart_location, driver_is_smoke, driver_comment, driver_depart_time) values (#{driver_seq}, #{m_id}, #{driver_depart_location}, #{driver_is_smoke}, #{driver_comment}, #{driver_depart_time})

insert into passenger (passenger_seq, m_id, passenger_depart_location, passenger_depart_time, driver_seq) values (#{passenger_seq}, #{m_id}, #{passenger_depart_location}, #{passenger_depart_time}, #{driver_seq})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select d.driver_seq, d.m_id driver_id, d.driver_depart_location, d.driver_is_smoke, d.driver_comment, d.driver_depart_time, p.passenger_seq, p.m_id passenger_id ,p.passenger_depart_location ,p.passenger_depart_time from driver d, passenger p where d.driver_seq = p.driver_seq and p.m_id = #{m_id} order by p.passenger_depart_time desc) a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
